timeline.message: Force english locale for reader-gtfs tests

timeline.author: karussell
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,7 +88,7 @@
                 <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                 <!-- Currently we need a bit more memory than for other tests -->
                 <configuration>
-                    <argLine>-Xmx1200m -Xms1200m</argLine>
+                    <argLine>-Xmx1200m -Xms1200m -Duser.language=en</argLine>

replies.bodyText: There are unittests checking error message contents which break with a different locale. We already set this in the parent POM but we need to explicitly set it here again, as we're overriding the inherited configuration.
replies.author: otbutz

timeline.bodyText:
The 'official' repository now seems to be: https://github.com/MobilityData/gtfs-realtime-bindings
Or is there another one?
This project was originally created by Google - MobilityData started to maintain the project in early 2019.

I don't know what io.leonard is, but they recommend these coordinates here: https://github.com/MobilityData/gtfs-realtime-bindings/blob/master/java/README.md#add-the-dependency
<dependency>
  <groupId>io.mobilitydata.transit</groupId>
  <artifactId>gtfs-realtime-bindings</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.7</version>
</dependency>
timeline.author: easbar

replies.bodyText:
https://search.maven.org/search?q=a:gtfs-realtime-bindings
io.mobilitydata.transit does not provide a 0.0.7 release
replies.author: otbutz

replies.bodyText: But it seems to be here: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.mobilitydata.transit/gtfs-realtime-bindings/0.0.7 ?
replies.author: easbar

replies.bodyText: Hm, but it does not work. See also this comment: MobilityData/gtfs-realtime-bindings#70 (comment)
replies.author: easbar

replies.bodyText: I've switched to 0.0.5. We can still update the lib in a later PR
replies.author: otbutz

replies.bodyText:
But it seems to be here: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.mobilitydata.transit/gtfs-realtime-bindings/0.0.7 ?


Note: this artifact is located at JCenter repository (https://jcenter.bintray.com/)
replies.author: otbutz

replies.bodyText: Ok sure, 0.0.5 seems to use protobuf 3.6.1
replies.author: easbar

timeline.bodyText: Looks like the indentation is slightly off here
timeline.author: easbar

timeline.message: Move dependency version into parent pom
Ignore transient dependency on older protobuf-java version
Force english locale for reader-gtfs tests
Force english locale for reader-gtfs tests
